verses.text: \w In|strong="H8141"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w thirty-sixth|strong="H7970"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* Asa’s \w reign|strong="H4438"\w*, \w Baasha|strong="H1201"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w went|strong="H3318"\w* \w up|strong="H5927"\w* \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w fortified|strong="H1129"\w* \w Ramah|strong="H7414"\w* \w to|strong="H3318"\w* \w prevent|strong="H1115"\w* anyone \w from|strong="H3318"\w* \w leaving|strong="H3318"\w* \w or|strong="H1115"\w* entering \w the|strong="H5921"\w* territory \w of|strong="H4428"\w* Asa \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*.

\w So|strong="H7971"\w* Asa withdrew \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w silver|strong="H3701"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w gold|strong="H2091"\w* \w from|strong="H3318"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* treasuries \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w royal|strong="H4428"\w* \w palace|strong="H1004"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w he|strong="H3068"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w it|strong="H7971"\w* \w with|strong="H1004"\w* \w this|strong="H3068"\w* \w message|strong="H3068"\w* \w to|strong="H3318"\w* \w Ben-hadad|strong="H1130"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* Aram, \w who|strong="H3068"\w* \w was|strong="H3068"\w* \w ruling|strong="H3427"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w Damascus|strong="H1834"\w*:

“\w Let|strong="H7971"\w* \w there|strong="H2009"\w* \w be|strong="H3478"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w treaty|strong="H1285"\w* \f + \fr 16:3 \ft Forms of the Hebrew berit are translated in most passages as covenant; twice in this verse.\f* \w between|strong="H5921"\w* \w me|strong="H7971"\w* \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w you|strong="H7971"\w*, \w between|strong="H5921"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* father \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w your|strong="H5921"\w* father. \w See|strong="H2009"\w*, \w I|strong="H2009"\w* \w have|strong="H3478"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w you|strong="H7971"\w* \w silver|strong="H3701"\w* \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w gold|strong="H2091"\w*. \w Now|strong="H2009"\w* \w go|strong="H3212"\w* \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w break|strong="H6565"\w* \w your|strong="H5921"\w* \w treaty|strong="H1285"\w* \w with|strong="H1285"\w* \w Baasha|strong="H1201"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w so|strong="H7971"\w* \w that|strong="H3478"\w* \w he|strong="H5921"\w* \w will|strong="H4428"\w* \w withdraw|strong="H5927"\w* \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w me|strong="H7971"\w*.”

\w And|strong="H3478"\w* \w Ben-hadad|strong="H1130"\w* \w listened|strong="H8085"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w King|strong="H4428"\w* Asa \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w commanders|strong="H8269"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w armies|strong="H2428"\w* \w against|strong="H7971"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, conquering \w Ijon|strong="H5859"\w*, \w Dan|strong="H1835"\w*, Abel-maim,\f + \fr 16:4 \ft Abel-maim was also known as Abel-beth-maacah; see 1 Kings 15:20.\f* \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w store|strong="H4543"\w* \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Naphtali|strong="H5321"\w*.

\w When|strong="H1961"\w* \w Baasha|strong="H1201"\w* learned \w of|strong="H8085"\w* \w this|strong="H8085"\w*, \w he|strong="H1129"\w* \w stopped|strong="H2308"\w* \w fortifying|strong="H1129"\w* \w Ramah|strong="H7414"\w* \w and|strong="H8085"\w* abandoned \w his|strong="H8085"\w* \w work|strong="H4399"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H3947"\w* \w King|strong="H4428"\w* Asa \w brought|strong="H3947"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w men|strong="H3605"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w they|strong="H3605"\w* \w carried|strong="H5375"\w* \w away|strong="H3947"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* stones \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Ramah|strong="H7414"\w* \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w timbers|strong="H6086"\w* \w Baasha|strong="H1201"\w* \w had|strong="H4428"\w* \w used|strong="H3605"\w* \w for|strong="H6086"\w* \w building|strong="H1129"\w*. \w And|strong="H3063"\w* \w with|strong="H4428"\w* \w these|strong="H3947"\w* materials \w he|strong="H3605"\w* \w built|strong="H1129"\w* \w up|strong="H5375"\w* \w Geba|strong="H1387"\w* \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w Mizpah|strong="H4709"\w*. Hanani’s Message to Asa

\w At|strong="H5921"\w* \w that|strong="H7200"\w* \w time|strong="H6256"\w* \w Hanani|strong="H2607"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w seer|strong="H7200"\w* \w came|strong="H3068"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w King|strong="H4428"\w* Asa \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* \w and|strong="H3063"\w* told \w him|strong="H5921"\w*, “\w Because|strong="H5921"\w* \w you|strong="H5921"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w relied|strong="H8172"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* Aram \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w*, \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w army|strong="H2426"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* Aram \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w escaped|strong="H4422"\w* \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*.

\w Were|strong="H1961"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* Cushites \f + \fr 16:8 \ft That is, people from the upper Nile region\f* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w Libyans|strong="H3864"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* vast \w army|strong="H2428"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w many|strong="H7230"\w* \w chariots|strong="H7393"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w horsemen|strong="H6571"\w*? \w Yet|strong="H3068"\w* \w because|strong="H5921"\w* \w you|strong="H5414"\w* \w relied|strong="H8172"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w He|strong="H3068"\w* \w delivered|strong="H5414"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w* \w into|strong="H5921"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w roam|strong="H7751"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w fro|strong="H7751"\w* \w over|strong="H5921"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* earth, \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w show|strong="H2388"\w* \w Himself|strong="H3824"\w* \w strong|strong="H2388"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w behalf|strong="H5921"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w those|strong="H3605"\w* \w whose|strong="H3605"\w* \w hearts|strong="H3824"\w* \w are|strong="H5869"\w* \w fully|strong="H5921"\w* \w devoted|strong="H8003"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w Him|strong="H5921"\w*. \w You|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H3426"\w* \w acted|strong="H5528"\w* \w foolishly|strong="H5528"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w this|strong="H2063"\w* matter. \w From|strong="H5921"\w* \w now|strong="H6258"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w*, \w therefore|strong="H5921"\w*, \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3426"\w* \w at|strong="H5921"\w* \w war|strong="H4421"\w*.”

Asa \w was|strong="H1931"\w* \w angry|strong="H3707"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w seer|strong="H7200"\w* \w and|strong="H1004"\w* \w became|strong="H7200"\w* \w so|strong="H4480"\w* \w enraged|strong="H2197"\w* \w over|strong="H5921"\w* \w this|strong="H2063"\w* matter \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w put|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w man|strong="H7200"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w prison|strong="H1004"\w*. \w And|strong="H1004"\w* \w at|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w same|strong="H1931"\w* \w time|strong="H6256"\w* Asa \w oppressed|strong="H7533"\w* \w some|strong="H4480"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*. The Death and Burial of Asa

\w Now|strong="H2009"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* rest \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w acts|strong="H1697"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* Asa, \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w beginning|strong="H7223"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* end, \w are|strong="H3478"\w* \w indeed|strong="H2009"\w* \w written|strong="H3789"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w Book|strong="H5612"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w Kings|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

\w In|strong="H8141"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w thirty-ninth|strong="H7970"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w reign|strong="H4438"\w*, Asa \w became|strong="H2456"\w* \w diseased|strong="H2456"\w* \w in|strong="H8141"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w feet|strong="H7272"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* malady \w became|strong="H2456"\w* increasingly \w severe|strong="H4605"\w*. \w Yet|strong="H3588"\w* \w even|strong="H1571"\w* \w in|strong="H8141"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w illness|strong="H2483"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w did|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w seek|strong="H1875"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w but|strong="H3588"\w* \w only|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w physicians|strong="H7495"\w*.

\w So|strong="H4191"\w* \w in|strong="H8141"\w* \w the|strong="H5973"\w* forty-first \w year|strong="H8141"\w* \w of|strong="H8141"\w* \w his|strong="H4191"\w* \w reign|strong="H4427"\w*, Asa \w died|strong="H4191"\w* \w and|strong="H8141"\w* \w rested|strong="H7901"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w his|strong="H4191"\w* fathers.

\w And|strong="H1419"\w* \w he|strong="H5704"\w* \w was|strong="H1732"\w* \w buried|strong="H6912"\w* \w in|strong="H6912"\w* \w the|strong="H5704"\w* \w tomb|strong="H6913"\w* \w that|strong="H5892"\w* \w he|strong="H5704"\w* \w had|strong="H1732"\w* \w cut|strong="H3738"\w* \w out|strong="H5704"\w* \w for|strong="H5704"\w* himself \w in|strong="H6912"\w* \w the|strong="H5704"\w* \w City|strong="H5892"\w* \w of|strong="H5892"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w*. \w They|strong="H5704"\w* \w laid|strong="H7901"\w* \w him|strong="H6912"\w* \w on|strong="H5892"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* bier \w that|strong="H5892"\w* \w was|strong="H1732"\w* \w full|strong="H4390"\w* \w of|strong="H5892"\w* \w spices|strong="H1314"\w* \w and|strong="H1419"\w* various blended perfumes; \w then|strong="H1732"\w* \w they|strong="H5704"\w* \w made|strong="H4639"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w fire|strong="H8316"\w* \w in|strong="H6912"\w* \w his|strong="H1732"\w* honor.
